channel.title: Cupper Examples on Cupper
channel.description: Recent content in Cupper Examples on Cupper

item.title: Examples
item.description: You can just write markdown here. But don’t forget there are lots of shortcodes to help you with writing and showing off code too. See the documentation for Cupper for full details. I can reference the pattern here. Here’s an example of a note shortcode for adding little “oh and also” notes to your patterns’ documentation. This is a warning! It’s about something the reader should be careful to do or to avoid doing.
